name: On Performance-T - Men's
description: The bare minimum so you can perform at your maximum. The fabrics weigh next to nothing, while they keep you cool and dry during high-intensity training. The seams are taped, instead of stitched, so they weight little and feel like you're hardly wearing anything.Lightweight polyester is wicking and quick to dry.Mesh back vents excess heat.Bonded seams for smooth, chafe-free wear.
